name: geist-ui-components
title: Geist UI Components & Hooks
description: This extension provides links to components & hooks in Geist UI Documentation
author: RahulatRaycast

commands.name: geist-ui-components
commands.title: Components
commands.subtitle: Geist UI Components & Hooks
commands.description: Finds components in Geist UI Documentation

commands.name: geist-ui-hooks
commands.title: Hooks
commands.subtitle: Geist UI Components & Hooks
commands.description: Finds hooks in Geist UI Documentation

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
